category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > LTE IoT
name: mikroe.click.lteiot8
short_description: LTE IoT 8 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a low-power solution for LTE and NB-IoT connectivity. This board features the SKY66430-11, a multi-band multi-chip System-in-Package (SiP) supporting 5G Massive IoT (LTE-M/NB-IoT) platforms from Skyworks Solutions and Sequans Communications.
